name: 3D Platformer by Mikhael Ming
description:
Create By Mikhael Ming 

With modification:

- Create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level (Level 1,2,3)

- Reskin the existing graphics in some significant way, such as change the player or an enemy to a completely different character. (Enemy Boss)

- Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game. (Level 1,2,3)
